articles.description: All Premier League clubs are deemed financially compliant for the 2023-24 season, including Leicester, Newcastle, Aston Villa & Newcastle.
articles.title: Premier League clubs avoid PSR charges for 2023-24 season

articles.description: Maro Itoje is promoted to England captain for the Six Nations, replacing Saracens team-mate Jamie George in the role.
articles.title: Six Nations: Maro Itoje to captain England instead of Jamie George

articles.description: Tyson Fury has announced his retirement - but after a history of calling it quits, should he be believed this time?
articles.title: Tyson Fury retires: Dick Turpin, Oleksandr Usyk & Anthony Joshua

articles.description: Manchester City move closer to the signature of Brazilian teenage defender Vitor Reis from Palmeiras in a deal reported to be worth £29.4 million.
articles.title: Manchester City close in on deal for Brazilian teenager Vitor Reis

articles.description: Daniil Medvedev destroys a net camera in a five-set thriller against world number 418 Kasidit Samrej in the Australian Open.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Daniil Medvedev destroys camera in five-set thriller against world number 418 Kasidit Samrej

articles.description: Katie Boulter becomes the sixth British player to win in this year's Australian Open singles draws - the most to reach the second round in the nation's history.
articles.title: Australian Open 2025 results: Katie Boulter wins to set new British record in Melbourne

articles.description: England need to find their edge to keep their Ashes hopes alive as they did in 2023 after a pitiful collapse in the second one-day international.
articles.title: Women's Ashes 2025: England collapse is the same old story after Australia's unlikely win

articles.description: Before they face leaders Liverpool on Tuesday, BBC Sport looks at whether Nottingham Forest can really win the Premier League.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest news: Can Reds emulate Leicester by winning Premier League?

articles.description: It is an indication of how much the golfing landscape is changing that Jon Rahm is starting his competitive year this week at the Hero Dubai Desert Classic, writes Iain Carter.
articles.title: Jon Rahm in DP World Tour action in Dubai at start of Ryder Cup year

articles.description: Lazio sack club falconer, Juan Bernabe, for sharing explicit photos online.
articles.title: Lazio falconer sacked for sharing explicit photos
